get.description: Retrieve cost information for specified parameters within a defined date range. The date range must be within a 6-month period. Optionally, you can specify cost aggregation type and date order for the results.

parameters.description: Start date for the cost information retrieval in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format
parameters.name: startDate

parameters.description: End date for the cost information retrieval in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format
parameters.name: endDate

parameters.description: List of migration IDs to filter the cost information
parameters.name: migrationIds

parameters.description: List of cloud providers to filter the cost information
parameters.name: provider

parameters.description: List of resource types to filter the cost information
parameters.name: resourceTypes

parameters.description: List of resource IDs to filter the cost information
parameters.name: resourceIds

parameters.description: Type of cost aggregation for the results (e.g., 'daily', 'weekly', 'monthly')
parameters.name: costAggregationType

parameters.description: Order of dates in the result (e.g., 'asc', 'desc')
parameters.name: dateOrder

parameters.description: Order of resource types in the result (e.g., 'asc', 'desc')
parameters.name: resourceTypeOrder

post.description: Update cost information for specified resources, including details such as migration ID, cost resources, and additional AWS info if applicable. The request body must include a valid migration ID and a list of cost resources. If AWS-specific details are provided, ensure all required fields are populated.

parameters.description: Request body containing cost update information
parameters.name: body

get.description: Retrieve a list of all installed load generators with pagination support.
get.summary: Get All Load Generator Install Info

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default 10, max 10)
parameters.name: size

500.description: Failed to retrieve monitoring agent information

post.description: Install a load generator either locally or remotely.

400.description: Load generator installation info is not correct.| available install locations are remote or local.

delete.description: Uninstall a previously installed load generator.

400.description: Load generator install info id must be number.

500.description: ant server has got error. please try again.

post.description: Install a monitoring agent on specific mci.

400.description: Monitoring agent installation info is not correct.

get.description: Retrieve monitoring agent information based on specified criteria.

post.description: Uninstall monitoring agents from specified VMs or all VMs in an mci.

get.description: Retrieve load test metrics based on provided parameters.

500.description: Failed to retrieve load test metrics

get.description: Retrieve load test result based on provided parameters.

500.description: Failed to retrieve load test result

get.description: Retrieve a list of all load test execution information with pagination support.
get.summary: Get All Load Test Execution Information

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default 10, max 10)
parameters.name: size

200.description: Successfully retrieved load test execution information

500.description: Failed to retrieve all load test execution information

get.description: Retrieve the load test execution state information for a specific load test key.

200.description: Successfully retrieved load test execution state information

400.description: Load test key must be set.

500.description: Failed to retrieve load test execution state information

post.description: Start a load test using the provided load test configuration.

400.description: load test install location is invalid.

500.description: ant server has got error. please try again.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all load test execution states with pagination support.
get.summary: Get All Load Test Execution State

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default 10, max 10)
parameters.name: size

200.description: Successfully retrieved load test execution state information

500.description: Failed to retrieve load test execution state information

get.description: Retrieve a load test execution state by load test key.

200.description: Successfully retrieved load test execution state information

400.description: Load test key must be set.

500.description: Failed to retrieve load test execution state information

post.description: Stop a running load test using the provided load test key.

400.description: load test running info is not correct.

500.description: ant server has got error. please try again.

get.description: Retrieve pricing information for cloud resources based on specified query parameters. Returns price data based on provider, region, instance type, vCPU, memory, and OS type. It offer instances with the lowest monthly prices what in the database.

post.description: Retrieve pricing information for cloud resources based on specified parameters. If saved data is more than 7 days, fetch new data and insert new price data even if same price as before.

parameters.description: Request body containing get price information
parameters.name: body

get.description: This endpoint checks if the CB-Ant API server is ready by verifying the status of both the load service and the cost service. If either service is unavailable, it returns a 503 status indicating the server is not ready.

503.description: CB-Ant API server is not ready

idleTime.description: time not spent sampling in jmeter (milliseconds) (generally 0)
